comments.body: I think these two parameters should be required too.
Based on `redux-form` types, they are optional, that's why I kept them optional, to not confuse people

Well I would go one way or the other then with the changes to the two functions. `blur` doesn't break without that parameter it just defaults to undefined and evaluated falsely.
https://github.com/erikras/redux-form/blob/v6.6.0/src/actions.js#L60
https://github.com/erikras/redux-form/blob/v6.6.0/src/reducer.js#L148

Well that's an implementation detail.
... but I think we can take the best of both worlds if we changed `blur` function to make `touch` optional. This way there will be no breaking changes for both functions

WDYT?

> ... but I think we can take the best of both worlds if we changed `blur` function to make `touch` optional. This way there will be no breaking changes for both functions

Agreed
